name: RGB WARS
description:
RGB WARS is an arcade style top-down shooter with a colorful twist. The goal of the game is very simple, reach the end but only the worthy one can do it!

Toggle between the RGB colors in this one of its kind shooter , a game so fast paced that it won't even leave you time to blink.

FEATURES

  • SUPER ULTRA FAST PACED SHOOTER
  • TAKE YOUR COGNITIVE SENSE OF COLOR RECOGNITION TO IT'S LIMITS
  • BATTLE 8 WAVES OF SUPER SAVAGE ENEMIES
  • FREE TO PLAY
  • DIE , RESTART` AND DIE AGAIN

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS

  • POTATO

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS

  • Intel i7 6900k or AMD RYZEN 1800x
  • 128 GB RAM
  • TRIPLE 4K MONITOR
  • DUAL NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti
  • 40 TB STORAGE
  • A GOOD SENSE OF HUMOUR

INFORMATION

SINGLE PLAYER ONLY.

A GAME MADE BY P.PRASANTH SUNDARAM & VIVEK SINGH

IF YOU LIKE THE GAME PLEASE SUPPORT US BY SHARING THE GAME WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY.

IF YOU LOVE US PLEASE SHARE THE GAME.

IF YOU HATE US THEN DEFINITELY SHARE THE GAME.

THANK YOU !
